Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay!”
Reviews.Author: CallyEP
Reviews.Content: stayed homestead suites memphis airport august 2010 eight days check fast elevator nice corner spacious nice clean stayed extended stay hotels opinion homestead suites step extended stay hotels liked safe nice friendly hotel staff inviting lobby bathroom counter sink lots space clothing cabinets food hotel near airport heard noise plane nice comfortable key kept deactivating glass sliding doors closet loose door completely track payed internet desk pass code time shower curtain thin fabric plastic shower liner toilet paper holder broken cobwebs corners walls night person dog dog followed elevator

Reviews.Title: “Going to the airport? Good Luck!”
Reviews.Author: alespi
Reviews.Content: stuck memphis 3 days simple task coming airport pain front desk person rude didnt try explain reasons shuttle service companys website complimentary airport shuttle service spent 60 dollars taxi fare stay hotel totally misleading
